item.text: (cha) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 大般若經第六部
@##/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig pa/ 'di
ltar nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
des na/ gang 'di nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di
ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa
nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su
byas pa'o/ /'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa
yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
des na/ gang 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/

ma skyes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya
ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid/ chen
po stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/
'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes
pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar
'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/

gang 'di 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba
de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid
kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di
thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma
yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dor ba
myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma

skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang
gzhan ma yin ste/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myi dmyigs

pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa

stong pa nyid/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /

'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan

ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di
dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma

skyes pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnams grangs des na/ gang 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes

bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams/ yang dag

par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/

ma skyes pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams/ dbang po rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dbang po rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /

'di ltar stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang stobs rnams/ stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

gang 'di stobs rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byang chub

kyi yan lag rnams/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa yang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di
ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes
pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams/ bsam gtan rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bsam gtan rnams shes

bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams/ tshad myed pa rnams

kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshad myed pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar

rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par thar pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/
ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa

nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa/

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang

mngon par shes pa rnams/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas

pa'o/ /'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma

skyes pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed
pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams/ shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i
grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa

ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myi 'jigs pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan
ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
grangs des na/ gang 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar byams pa chen po yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma
yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di byams pa chen po shes bya ba de ni

gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang ma skyes

pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan

ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
grangs des na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang

gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i

'bras bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas

pa'o/ /'di ltar phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin

te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /

'di ltar rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang byang chub/ rang byang chub nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di

rang byang chub ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes

pa nyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di

ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe/

shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du shes kyi ma

skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par
dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi ma

skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sgra'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dri'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
ro'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ reg gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam
par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i

slad du/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi rnam

par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes

pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam

par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi

'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ mye'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/

nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa

mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i

slad du/ mying dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/

shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ len pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar

'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa mthong

bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/

shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam
par dag pa'i slad du/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu

rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyi nang stong pa

nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/

shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang bzhin stong

pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma

skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa

mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa

mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar

'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
slad du/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bsam gtan

rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/

mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma
skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa

mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin

tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par

dag pa'i slad du/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos

kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong
bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu

rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dgra

bcom pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/

shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/

byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar

'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyi don shes pa ltar na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes la/ tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ 'du shes

kyang ma skyes pa/ 'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ myig kyang ma skyes la/ rna ba yang ma skyes pa/ sna yang ma skyes pa/ lce yang ma skyes pa/ lus kyang ma skyes pa/ yid kyang ma skyes pa/ gzugs

kyang ma skyes la/ sgra yang ma skyes pa/ dri yang ma skyes pa/ ro yang ma skyes pa/ reg kyang ma skyes pa/ chos kyang ma skyes pa/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ sna'i

rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i 'dus

te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ lus

kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ sa'i khams kyang ma skyes la/ chu'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ mye'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/

rlung gi khams kyang ma skyes pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ ma rig pa yang ma skyes la/ 'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ mying

dang gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ skye mched drug kyang ma skyes pa/ reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ sred pa yang ma skyes pa/ len pa yang ma skyes pa/ srid pa yang ma skyes pa/ skye ba yang ma

skyes pa/ rga shi yang ma skyes pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes la/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ phyi nang stong pa

nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ don dam stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma

skyes pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/

chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma

skyes pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ dbang
po rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang ma skyes pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma
skyes la/ bsam gtan bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang ma skyes pa/ mthar kyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang ma skyes pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang ma skyes pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ ting nge 'dzin
rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang ma skyes pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/

byams pa chen po yang ma skyes pa/ snying rje chen po yang ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma skyes pa/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes

pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ so so'i skye bo yang ma skyes pa/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang ma skyes pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/

lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang ma skyes pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ phyir myi 'ong ba yang ma skyes pa/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ dgra bcom pa yang ma skyes pa/ dgra bcom pa'i

chos kyang ma skyes pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyang

ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin na/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar gal te/ gzugs kyang skye ba myed la/ tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ 'du shes kyang skye ba myed/ 'du byed kyang skye ba myed/

rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ myig kyang skye ba myed la/ rna ba yang skye ba myed/ sna yang skye ba myed/ lce yang skye ba myed/ lus kyang skye ba myed/ yid kyang skye ba myed/ gzugs kyang skye ba myed la/

sgra yang skye ba myed/ dri yang skye ba myed/ ro yang skye ba myed/ reg kyang skye ba myed/ chos kyang skye ba myed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ sna'i

rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed la/

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/
myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/

lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ sa'i khams kyang

skye ba myed la/ chu'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ mye'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ rlung gi khams kyang skye ba myed/ nam mkha'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ ma rig

pa yang skye ba myed la/ 'du byed kyang skye ba myed/ rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ mying dang gzugs kyang skye ba myed/ skye mched drug kyang skye ba myed/ reg pa yang skye ba myed/ tshor ba yang skye ba myed/

sred pa yang skye ba myed/ len pa yang skye ba myed/ srid pa yang skye ba myed/ skye ba yang skye ba myed/ rga shi yang skye ba myed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang skye ba myed la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yang skye ba myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang skye ba myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang skye ba myed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang skye ba myed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa yang skye ba myed/ nang stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed la/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ stong pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/

don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa

nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ myi dmyigs pa

stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang skye ba myed

la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang skye ba myed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ dbang po rnams kyang skye ba myed/ stobs rnams kyang skye ba myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang skye ba myed/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang skye ba myed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang skye ba myed la/ bsam gtan rnams kyang skye ba myed/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ gzugs
myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang skye ba myed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang skye ba myed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang skye ba myed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang skye ba myed/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs rnams kyang skye ba myed/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang skye ba myed/ byams pa chen po yang skye ba myed/ snying rje chen po yang skye ba myed/ sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang skye ba myed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang skye ba myed la/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ so so'i

skye bo yang skye ba myed la/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang skye ba myed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang skye ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong

ba'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ phyir myi 'ong ba yang skye ba myed/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ dgra bcom pa yang skye ba myed/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ rang sangs rgyas kyang skye ba myed/ rang

sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba myed/ byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba myed/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ sangs rgyas kyang skye ba myed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba myed na ni/ nyan thos

kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa

pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha

myi dad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na/ ci'i phyir na/ rgyun tu
zhugs pas ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spong ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lam bsgoms/ phyir myi 'ong bas ni/ dam pa ma

yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni/ rang

byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/ ci'i phyir na/

de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor/ de skad ces smras pa dang /

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par myi 'dod de/ ma skyes

pa la rgyun tu zhugs pa yod par myi 'dod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par myi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par myi 'dod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par myi 'dod do/ /

ma skyes pa la phyir myi 'ong ba yod par myi 'dod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par myi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par myi 'dod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par myi 'dod do/ /

ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par myi 'dod do/ /rang byang chub yod par myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod

par myi 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis myi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na/ sems
can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i don bya bar myi nus kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas/
sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa'i don bya ba de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ji ltar bdag

bdag ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs pa/ de bzhin du phyi nang gyi chos rnams la yang 'du shes bskyed de/ de ltar bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes

myi bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la chos gang la yang myi len myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma skyes pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa yod par myi 'dod na/

bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par myi 'dod de/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa 'am/ 'thob par bya ba myed do/ /smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis chos skyes pa 'thob pa dang / 'thob par bya bar 'dod dam/ 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par myi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par myi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na 'thob pa myed la mngon par rtogs pa myed dam/
rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa yang yod/ mngon par rtogs yang yod de/ gnyis kyis ma yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa 'am mngon par
rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/
sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyis tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/ don dam pas ni 'thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/
dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa myed do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i 'jig rten

gyi tha snyad du yod pa/ de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs

par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam par ni las kyang
myed/ las kyi rnam par smyin pa yang myed/ skye ba yang myed/ 'gag pa yang myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang myed/ rnam par byang ba yang myed do/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i
chos skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on tam skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar myi 'dod/ skyes pa'i chos
kyang skye bar myi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar myi 'dod pa gang yin// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/

rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong

pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du shes ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed ma skyes pa rang

bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig ma skyes pa rang

bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis

stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sgra ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dri ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ bdag ni ro ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi

'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar

myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang

bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong

pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis

stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sa'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chu'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mye'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rlung gi khams ma skyes pa

rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni nam mkha'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par

shes pa'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma rig pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni 'du byed ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni mying dang gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye mched drug ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sred

pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni len pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni srid pa ma skyes

pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rga shi ma skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshul khrims

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa' ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa

rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni

nang stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi

'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni

thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa

skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma skyes pa rang

bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi

rkang pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dbang po rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag

ni stobs rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa

skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshad myed pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis

stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar

pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma skyes pa

rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byams pa chen po ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni snying rje chen po ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skyes pa rang

bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lan

cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang byang chub ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma skyes pa

rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skyes pa skye bar myi 'dod pa gang / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar

myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du shes skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu/ bdag ni sna skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus

skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sgra skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dri skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa

skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ro skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye

bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang

bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi 'dus te

reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni

sna'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa' skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod

do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend

kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni

sa'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chu'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag

ni mye'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rlung gi khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni nam mkha'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma rig pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mying dang gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye mched drug skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sred pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni len pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni rga shi skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa skyes pa rang

bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid

skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid skyes

pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid

skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid

skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu/ bdag ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar

myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid

skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po

myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dbang po rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stobs rnams

skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis

stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshad myed pa rnams

skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra

dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong

pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni

mngon par shes pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar

myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byams pa chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni snying rje chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin

gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyir

myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bdag ni rang byang chub skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor skye ba skye 'am/ 'on tam myi skye ba skye/ smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba yang myi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba myed pa'i grangs su gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang

ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bltar myed pa thogs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam grangs des na skye ba

yang myi skye myi skye ba yang myi skye'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams

kyi skye ba myed pa la'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod pa la bdag gis spobs pa myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba myed pa yang bdag gis ni

brjod par yang spobs pa myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang

yin pa dang / myi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bltar myed pa thogs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid

gcig pa dag go/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa ni skye ba myed ces bya ba yin te/ spobs pa yang skye ba myed la chos kyang skye ba myed de/ gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de

dag kyang skye ba myed pa yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni ma skyes pa'o/ /spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o/ /chos ni ma skyes pa'o/ /gang las brtsams

te smra bar spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang ma skyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs skye ba myed do/ /tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /'du shes skye ba myed do/ /'du byed skye

ba myed do/ /rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /myig skye ba myed do/ /rna ba skye ba myed do/ /sna skye ba myed do/ /lce skye ba myed do/ /lus skye ba myed do/ /yid skye ba myed do/ /gzugs skye ba myed do/ /sgra skye

ba myed do/ /dri skye ba myed do/ /ro skye ba myed do/ /reg skye ba myed do/ /chos skye ba myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /
lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa

skye ba myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /lus kyi

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /sa'i khams skye ba myed do/ /chu'i khams skye ba myed do/ /mye'i khams skye ba myed do/ /rlung gi

khams skye ba myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams skye ba myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba myed do/ /ma rig pa skye ba myed do/ /'du byed skye ba myed do/ /rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /mying dang gzugs skye ba myed

do/ /skye mched drug skye ba myed do/ /reg pa skye ba myed do/ /tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /sred pa skye ba myed do/ /len pa skye ba myed do/ /srid pa skye ba myed do/ /skye ba skye ba myed do/ /rga shi skye ba myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /don dam

pa stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /

dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba
rnams skye ba myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /dbang po rnams skye ba myed do/ /stobs rnams skye ba myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye ba myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa skye ba myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams skye ba myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

skye ba myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa

skye ba myed do/ mngon par shes pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa

rnams skye ba myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /byams pa chen po skye ba myed do/ /snying rje chen po skye ba myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu skye ba myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /rang byang chub skye ba myed do/ /lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ brjod pa ni skye ba myed pa ste/ spobs pa yang

skye ba myed la chos kyang skye ba myed do/ /gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba myed pa'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa myed do/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi

nyan thos chos thams cad la gnas pa myed pa dag gi chos nyid de de dag ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dag de la thogs pa myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad myi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /

smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad myi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang

myi gnas/ phyi rol na yang myi gnas/ gnyis ka myed par yang myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang myi gnas phyi rol na yang myi gnas gnyis

ka myed par yang myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang myi gnas phyi rol na yang myi gnas gnyis ka myed par yang myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang myi gnas phyi rol na yang myi gnas gnyis ka myed par yang myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rang

bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang myi gnas phyi rol na yang myi gnas gnyis ka myed par yang myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang myi gnas

phyi rol na yang myi gnas gnyis ka myed par yang myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang myi gnas phyi rol na yang myi gnas gnyis ka myed par yang
